company1.title: UI UX Designer

company2.title: Junior UI UX Designer
description: Designed a fintech product with multiple payment flows, integrating 20+ BBPS services, UPI, ad-hoc payments, recurring payments, and an autopay system during its emerging phase.

Handled the entire design process—from conceptualization and user research to information architecture, wireframing, prototyping, and crafting intuitive, visually appealing user interfaces for both mobile and web.
